Class: GeoMap

GeoMap()

new GeoMap()

Properties:
Name Type Description
options object Configuartion for SURE UI data model.
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
Geodata array <optional>
 [] Predefined data for a component. It should be an array of object.
Properties
Name Type Description
locations array Location details to plot on Map. It should be an array of object.
Properties
Name Type Description
SureName string Location Name to plot on Map.
Latitude string Latitude of the location where marker will display.
Longitude string Longitude of the location where marker will display
Attaches object Other details for drawing markers as Type, Subtype,Alarm State 
{"Attaches": {"Type": "LCTP","SureName": "Port A/1-FCP","DisplayName": "Port A/1-FCP","state": {"AlarmState": "MAJOR"}}}
path array Path details to plot on Map between locations defined. It should be an array of object.
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
Type string Type of path to be markedon map.
SureName string Name of path to be plotted on Map.
state object <optional>
 Status object. It can contain multiple state. Pass in each state as a property of an object. 
{"AlarmState" : ["MAJOR", "MINOR", "WARNING", "CRITICAL"]}
alarmStatus array <optional>
 [] Predefined data for alarm status of a component. It should be an array of object.
Properties
Name Type Description
stateType string Define Alarm State type as AlarmState,Operational State etc.
properties array Defined Properties of Alarms. It should be an array of object.
Properties
Name Type Description
state string Defined name of Alarm.
priority string Defined priority of Alarm. It has to be a number. Priority is handeled in ascending order.
color string Defined color of Alarm.The markers and paths with the alarm will be of the defined color. It has to be HEX COLOR CODE.
methodGeo string POST Http method for SURE REST API.
methodAlarms string GET Http method for SURE REST API of ALARM STATUS.
metadataUrl string Http method for SURE REST API METADATA.
domain string Http domain for SURE REST API.
topourl string URL for SURE REST to render Geo Map Data.
Alarmurl string URL for SURE REST to render Alarm Status Data.
geoDataUnmount object <optional>
 Function/Object with the component call to mount other component once Geo Map is unmounted.
AalrmrequestHeaders object Additional headers for Aalrm Status API which usually includes authorization info.
requestHeaders object Additional headers for Geo Map API which usually includes authorization info.
currentEntity string Current Entity on which Geo Map Loads.
iconBaseUrl string Url of folder location where the component resides to load the icons with absolute path
selectedEntityRow string Selected Entity Row Data on which Geo Map Loads.
Source:
  • geoMap.jsx, line 10
Examples
{@lang xml}

Access component as a Library

HTML
<div id="geoMapView"></div>
<span id="infoDialog"></span>

JS


var geoMap = SUREUI.components.GeoMap;
    var geoDataUnmount = function(x){
       if(x){
           ReactDOM.render(dataGridComponent, document.getElementById("dataGrid"));
       }
   }

let options = {
              methodGeo: "POST",
              methodAlarms: "GET",
             metadataUrl: "http://135.250.193.220:8081/osscm/commons/catalog/",
             domain: "http://135.250.193.220:8081",
            topourl: "/oss/sure/topology",
             Alarmurl : "specifications?q=specName;EQUALS;AlarmState;ic,specName;EQUALS;OperationalState;ic&q=subType;EQUALS;State&q=specType;EQUALS;State;ic&fullTree=true",
             style: {
                height: window.innerHeight,
                width: window.innerWidth
            }
        };
        options.geoDataUnmount = geoDataUnmount;
        options.AalrmrequestHeaders = {
           Authorization: 'Basic YWRtaW46YWRtaW5AMTIz',
          tenantId: 'GlobalTenant',
          ugId: 'Admin_UserGroup',
          appId: 'SURE_APP',
          Accept: 'application/json',
          TransformationEnabled: false,
         'Content-Type': 'application/json',
         'Response-Type': 'normal'
     };
    options.requestHeaders = {
         Authorization: 'Basic YWRtaW46YWRtaW5AMTIz',
         tenantId: 'GlobalTenant',
        ugId: 'Admin_UserGroup',
        appId: 'SURE_APP',
         Accept: 'application/json',
         TransformationEnabled: true,
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        'Response-Type': 'flat'
     };
    options.currentEntity = "";
     options.iconBaseUrl = "";
  options.selectedEntityRow =   {
                       "CreatedByAppId": "SURE_APP",
                       "CreationDate": "2017-10-06T15:51:19.559+05:30",
                       "CreatedByUgId": "GlobalTenant_Admin_UserGroup",
                      "UpdatedByUgId": "GlobalTenant_Admin_UserGroup",
                      "SubType": "LSP",
                      "Category": "SERVICE",
                      "DiscoveryLevel": "Level4",
                      "CreatedByTenantId": "GlobalTenant",
                      "Template Name": "TestPath",
                     "CAPACITY_Sub_caps": "125 Mbps",
                     "Name": "TestingPath",
                     "Template Version": "1.0",
                     "CreatedByUserId": "admin",
                     "Type": "P2P Path",
                     "DiscoveredName": "PathforServiceOnMap",
                     "UpdatedByTenantId": "GlobalTenant",
                     "UpdatedByAppId": "SURE_APP",
                     "SureName": "PathforServiceOnMap",
                     "DisplayName": "PathforServiceOnMap",
                     "UUID": "182345ae-aa80-11e7-a52e-005056a80946",
                     "UpdatedByUserId": "admin",
                     "LastUpdateDate": "2017-10-06T16:00:44.228+05:30",
                     "PrimaryLabel": "Path"
                   };
          options.Geodata = [
                            {
                              "path": [
                                {
                                    "Type": "P2P Path",
                                    "SureName": "PathforServiceOnMap",
                                    "state": {
                                              "AlarmState": "CRITICAL"
                                              }
                                }
                                      ],
                              "locations": [
                                {
                                  "DiscoveredName": "Mumbai",
                                  "SureName": "Mumbai",
                                  "DisplayName": "Mumbai",
                                  "Latitude": "19.075984",
                                  "Longitude": "72.877656",
                                  "Attaches": {
                                    "Type": "LCTP",
                                    "SureName": "Port A/1-FCP",
                                    "DisplayName": "Port A/1-FCP",
                                    "state": {
                                              "AlarmState": "MAJOR"
                                              }
                                  }
                                },
                                {
                                  "DiscoveredName": "Bangalore",
                                  "SureName": "Bangalore",
                                  "DisplayName": "Bangalore",
                                  "Latitude": "12.971599",
                                  "Longitude": "77.594563",
                                  "Attaches": {
                                    "SubType": "Endpoint SAP",
                                    "Type": "UNI",
                                    "SureName": "Endpoint1",
                                      "state": {
                                              "AlarmState": "CRITICAL"
                                              }
                                          }
                                }
                              ]
                            }
                      ];
          options.alarmStatus = [
                                    {
                                      "stateType": "AlarmState",
                                      "properties": [
                                        {
                                          "state": "WARNING",
                                          "priority": "4",
                                          "color": "#42A5F5"
                                        },
                                        {
                                          "state": "CRITICAL",
                                          "priority": "1",
                                          "color": "#BE0006"
                                        },
                                        {
                                          "state": "MAJOR",
                                          "priority": "2",
                                          "color": "#FF7900"
                                        },
                                        {
                                          "state": "MINOR",
                                          "color": "#FFCC00",
                                          "priority": "3"
                                        }
                                      ]
                                    }
                                  ];
                                  
  var geomapComponent = React.createElement(geoMap, options);
  ReactDOM.render(geomapComponent, document.getElementById("geoMapView"));

Access component through iframe

 HTML
     <iframe id="geoMap" src="http://135.250.139.99:8092/" ></iframe>

 JS
     var iframe = document.getElementById('geoMap');
     let options = {
              methodGeo: "POST",
              methodAlarms: "GET",
             metadataUrl: "http://135.250.193.220:8081/osscm/commons/catalog/",
             domain: "http://135.250.193.220:8081",
            topourl: "/oss/sure/topology",
             Alarmurl : "specifications?q=specName;EQUALS;AlarmState;ic,specName;EQUALS;OperationalState;ic&q=subType;EQUALS;State&q=specType;EQUALS;State;ic&fullTree=true",
             style: {
                height: window.innerHeight,
                width: window.innerWidth
            }
        };
        options.geoDataUnmount = geoDataUnmount;
        options.AalrmrequestHeaders = {
           Authorization: 'Basic YWRtaW46YWRtaW5AMTIz',
          tenantId: 'GlobalTenant',
          ugId: 'Admin_UserGroup',
          appId: 'SURE_APP',
          Accept: 'application/json',
          TransformationEnabled: false,
         'Content-Type': 'application/json',
         'Response-Type': 'normal'
     };
    options.requestHeaders = {
         Authorization: 'Basic YWRtaW46YWRtaW5AMTIz',
         tenantId: 'GlobalTenant',
        ugId: 'Admin_UserGroup',
        appId: 'SURE_APP',
         Accept: 'application/json',
         TransformationEnabled: true,
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        'Response-Type': 'flat'
     };
    options.currentEntity = "Path";
     options.iconBaseUrl = "";
  options.selectedEntityRow =   {
                       "CreatedByAppId": "SURE_APP",
                       "CreationDate": "2017-10-06T15:51:19.559+05:30",
                       "CreatedByUgId": "GlobalTenant_Admin_UserGroup",
                      "UpdatedByUgId": "GlobalTenant_Admin_UserGroup",

     var ifarmeObj = {
             type: "ACCESS_SURE_UI_COMPONENT",
              payload: {
                  componentKey: "GeoMap",
                  properties: options
            }
       }

       iframe.contentWindow.postMessage(iframeObj, 'http://135.250.139.99:8092/');
